extendedInfo.description: MyPhoneExplorer is a powerful phone management software for your Desktop PC. Some features:- sync your phone with Outlook, Thunderbird, Sunbird, Lotus Notes, Tobit David, Windows Contacts, Windows Calendar,...- manage your SMS, Calllists, Apps, Files, handle Calls, create backups...Connection via WiFi, USB-Cable or Bluetooth.This is the client which is needed for phone, you'll need also the desktop-software which can be downloaded at www.fjsoft.at.

reviews.title: Best Phone-PC WiFi Sync App
reviews.comment: Every Android phone comes with some phone-to-desktop sync app, but MPE is much more powerful and customizable then what Samsung, HTC, Motorola or LG currently offers. Specially if you use Outlook without an Exchange ActiveSync corporate account, this is the only app that syncs notes, tasks, files (docs & media), calendar, contacts, call logs, messages \342\200\223 everything \342\200\223 while keeping each account separate. And both the app and its desktop companion are free!
reviews.author: D. Alex.

reviews.title: A must-have
reviews.comment: Solid app. I\'ve been using it for a number of years now, it\'s great for contact updates, organiser entries, file sync, and many more. In my case the app is on 8 hrs a day - it\'s my default phone-pc syncing tool. Good job.
reviews.author: Dariusz Prokop

reviews.title: Great app/program
reviews.comment: Works very well... and as mentioned previously, well work making a donation.
reviews.author: Steve C

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Very well done. Best I found for such tasks (sync, backup, browsing the device memory spaces...).
reviews.author: Nicolae Gancearuc

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Super App for business, plz try once you all will like it
reviews.author: infoway com

reviews.title: #1 APP EVER MADE
reviews.comment: FOR ANYONE GIVING THIS APP LESS THAN 5 STARS IS CLUELESS AS TO THE CAPABILITIES THIS MIGHTY APP CAN DO FOR YOU....THERES IS NOTHING OUT THERE THAT COMES CLOSE TO THIS AWESOME PROGRAM. I CANT WAIT TO SEE WHATS NEXT...KEEP UP THE GREAT JOB!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One app to sync all
reviews.comment: This app is marvelous. A must have for every phone. Syncs fast and error free. Plus one can monitor the phone from the comp too. Precise & user friendly comp client. EDIT: 5 to 3 stars. Android links various contact accounts like Google, Hotmail, Facebook, Whatsapp, Linkedin etc. MPE leaves them separate and syncs all of them, thereby creating duplicates in outlook. Even merging of multiple accounts in the Desktop app doesn\'t help. EDIT 2: With latest update copy/paste option missing in notes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: amazing piece of software
reviews.comment: i have been using it to sync my droids since the beginning whether HTC, Samsung, LG or any other droid, it works so perfectly. my rating is a +1,000,000
reviews.author: kaneza innocent

reviews.title: A four star app that...
reviews.comment: I would surely give a five star if the \"Control phone\" is less laggy and more android remote control realtime use. :)  ...but, it still helped me and this is a very nice app.  Thank you guys. :)
reviews.author: Johnny Walker

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: This is a very useful app. Occasional glitches with deleted contacts make using this app a little more time consuming than I\'d like, but it is still the best solution out there right now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Sync app to date
reviews.comment: Love it plus support field Outlook 2013 crowns it.... keep it up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Essential app for local sync
reviews.comment: I just want a reliable way to sync Outlook 2010 with my Galaxy S2. Direct connection, calendar, contacts and tasks. Nearly flawless for over two years!
reviews.author: Doug H

reviews.title: Virus stricken
reviews.comment: A good and useful app, but as long as FJ does not fix the virus problem om the pc download, it is utterly useless.
reviews.author: Jaco Wijnmaalen

reviews.title: Newest Update Fixed Many Problems
reviews.comment: I\'m running: PC: HP with Quad-core AMD 8 GB RAM,  1TB HDD Windows 8, MS Office 2003  Phone: Samsung Galaxy S3, Android 4.1.2, T-Mobile  App used to hang on sync of \"Events/Tasks\". After upgrade to version 1.8.5, all syncs work perfectly.   I have some duplication of events/appointments between Outlook  Calendar and other/Android Calendar but that is to be expected and NOT THE FAULT OF THIS APP!  I particularly like the file sync section which allows you to create different tasks for sections of your file...
reviews.author: Joe Dempsey, Sr.

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Samsung should employ this team... first class. Fast sync via wifi. Works,everything.  Way better than kies
reviews.author: Howard Posener

reviews.comment: I love this app very much, thankyuu developer....  ^^, I love this app very much, thankyuu developer....  ^^,
